```{r}

b <- timed_lapply(1:4, function(n) (mean(sample(n))))
b
```


```{r}
foo2 <- function(x) {
  return(list(
    aa = x+1,
    bb = x+2
  ))
}

a <- list(
  x = 1,
  y = 2
)
b <- lapply(a, foo2)

```



```{r}

foo <- function(n) {
  sort(sample(1e2))
}

mb_f <- function(f) {
  start <- Sys.time()
  res   <- f()
  runtime <- Sys.time() - start
  return(list(
    res  = res,
    time = runtime
  ))
}
a <- mb_f(foo)

```
